name: Adventure Escape: Framed for Murder
summary: Detective Kate Gray’s mentor, former Police Chief Sylvia, finds the dead body of a college student in her office. Kate’s investigation uncovers suspicious activity on campus. Could the gang problems, drug deals, and vandalism be related? Broaden the pool of suspects and uncover hidden connections between them. Match blood samples with evidence gathered at the scene. Has a false arrest been made? Is a deeper conspiracy afloat? Use your wits to solve puzzles in Adventure Escape: Framed for Murder!
